summary: A group of a run-down Tokyo high school students face the struggles of growing up, growing apart from their friends and worrying about their future, while living in a highly violent environment.
cast: Ryûhei Matsuda|Hirofumi Arai|Sôsuke Takaoka|Yûsuke Ohshiba|Yuta Yamazaki|Shûgo Oshinari|Takashi Tsukamoto|Eita|Onimaru|Kiyohiko Shibukawa|Kyôko Koizumi|Mame Yamada|Genta Dairaku|Erena|Hiroyuki Kobayashi|Nobuo Kyô|Ichi Omiya
keywords: high school|based on manga|based on comic
title: Aoi haru
